headline: Is It Time To Reassess Synopsys (SNPS) After Recent Share Price Recovery?
summary: If you are wondering whether Synopsys at around US$509 per share still offers value, the real test is how its current price compares with what the underlying business might reasonably be worth. The stock has returned 0.3% over the last 7 days and 7.2% over the last 30 days, while the 1 year return is a 7.6% decline and the 3 and 5 year returns are 42.8% and 96.6% respectively. This gives a mixed picture of recent momentum and longer term performance. Recent coverage around Synopsys has...
